body.name: 8 Inch Nonstick Frying Pan, Granite Non Stick Skillet Pan, Small Egg Pan Omelette Pan, Induction Compatible, Dishwasher and Oven Safe, PFOA Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 19 mins
features: 🍳 Ultra Non-Stick Coating-The superior Granite interior of this omelet pan which combines the beauty of marble with the durability of a basic nonstick pan is ultra non-stick and scratch resistant.It keeps food sliding smoothly, making cooking and cleanig easier.

🍳 Bakelite Handles- The non-slip handle of the egg pan is soft bakelite which is ergonomically designed for both righty and lefties. A metal sheath is installed at the connection to prevent the flame from burning to the handle, keeps cool and non-slip during cooking, provides an excellent grip.

🍳 Heat Up Quickly & Evenly- Each layer of this nonstick frying pan does its own job. The aluminum alloy body ensures the durability, the joint reinforcement layers ensure heated evenly. With Extended Bottom Design, our cookware heats up within 10 seconds.

🍳 Small Fry Pan For Multipurpose Use- The 8 inch small skillet is commonly used for One fried egg, steak, breakfast meats, sauteing vegetables for a side dish. The bottom of the omelet pan compatibles with all stovetops (gas, electric, glass and induction).
🍳Oven & Dishwasher Safe - No PFOA & PFAS,lead, & cadmium design at high temperatures. Easy to clean, just wipe it with a towel or rinse it with water. Oven and broiler safe up to 302°F.

🍳 Service & Guarantee- Ecowin Cookware since 1992. Your purchase is guaranteed. Each piece of our products passes strict multi inspection process. 30-day refund guarantee and 12-month limited warranty. . Try ecowin's cooking journey now

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ecowin Frying Pan Why Choice Us ✔ Super Non-stick - Choose "Whitford" Long-life granite coating from the USA to ensure excellent non-stick, 100% free of PFOA PTFE APEO✔ Super Durable - 5 layers of stone coating, it still has effective non-stick performance after 50000 times of simulation friction test✔ Super Energy Saving - The induction bottom heats up quickly in 10 seconds, you can cook with less oil, reducing oily smoke. Suitable for all stoves✔ Super Easy to Maintain - Excellent non-stick performance not only when cooking, but also when cleaning is also simple. In most cases, you only need to rinse the pot with clean water after cooling, and scrub with a soft sponge (please not to use Metal Scrubbers)

Fry Pan Description Model: COCOA SeriesSize Includes: 8 inch / 10 inch / 12 inchCoating Brand: WhitfordSuitable for cooking: Fried eggs, meat, vegetables, pancakes, omeletteApplicable stove type: Induction stove, gas stove, electric ceramic stovePacking: Recyclable Carton box

Scratch-resistant Nonstick Granite Coating Free of PFOA APEOSuper Easy to CleanLong-life Non-stick Soft Bakelite Handle Anti-scald and Non-slipErgonomics, Excellent GripWall-mounted design High-permeability Stainless Steel Bottom Suitable for All StovesNot DeformedEven Heat Conduction

Message from Ecowin Every family’s life is inseparable from a good set of pots and pans. They are not only a kitchen tool, but also carry the unique smell of home. You may cook different foods, it may be the first steak that your child fries for you, or bake a cake with your lover, the same is the taste of happiness. Ecowin cookware hopes to be the bearer of this taste, and strives to make this feeling lasting forever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome non-stick omelette pan!
reviews.reviewText: I’m able to make perfect French omelettes for my wife and good ol’ Americanized omelettes for my daughter. That’s all I use it for, though I’m sure it would do great with anything. Love the look, love the price, love the pan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Pan Ever
reviews.reviewText: Cooks well and cleans like a dream. Best part? My husband liked it so much he got me a whole set for my birthday! Sturdy, even heating and swishes clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had previously purchased the Ecowin 3 Quart Saucepan after reading reviews. I wanted a safer non-stick pan and the PFOA Free granite coating seemed good. That pan has been excellent. Since then we bought an induction range and needed a larger skillet and settled on this Ecowin 11 inch deep fry pan. They look great and cook great. A great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great pan ,nothing sticks to it, easy to wash. But Handle is loose, I thought maybe I didn't tighten it enough but its the metal between the handle and the pan that's loose.But other than that great pan...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: This pan is the perfect size for me The food doesn’t stick and so easy to clean. I would buy it again but in little larger size for company cooking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable pan - amazing customer service
reviews.reviewText: This is a great pan, replacing a similar one. Convenient size for eggs, etc. Fast delivery. Came with the handle detached but company provided the screws and a small screwdriver to assemble. Impressive! Also a customer "thank you" gift of a couple of sponges. Just a nice experience. Much appreciated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is just the size I was looking for, I love it. Easy to clean, great little and deep pan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I live alone so rarely need a large pan The small skillet is perfect for me to cook a couple of eggs, or a steak and then heat some veggies in the juice. Easy cleaning is a bonus.
Hola recomiendo ampliamente este sartén.Es fácil de lavar.Se puede cocinar cualquier cosa en el.Es excelente.
Los mejores que he adquirido, no sé adhiere nada, muy fáciles de limpiar y muy bonitos.

reviews.reviewTitle: A quality frypan that has excellent non-stick properties
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with our Ecowin Non-Stick Frying Pans. Having They have excellent non-stick properties and the pans have nice even temperatures across the cooking surface due to the large induction number of steel dimples on the bottom of the pans. We previously had expensive Swiss manufactured ceramic coated frying pans which had poor induction plates on the bottom that had to be run on higher power settings. As a result the pans produced uneven heating and food used to regularly stick in the hotter area of the cooking surface. The Ecowin fry pans are granite coated non-stick surfaces and because of the better induction plates on the bottom, we are getting nice even cooking at much lower temperature settings. Would highly recommend these fry pans to anyone looking for quality induction cookware that has excellent non-stick properties at a reasonable price.
El sarte cumple con lo que dice, no se pega nada.
